channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 4 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 4 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79ASL

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79ASN

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79ASS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79DCL

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79DCS

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79MCL

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79MCN

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79MCS

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79QSL

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79QSN

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79QSS

item.title: Field - r794afc
item.description: NUMBER OF AVAIL FRAMES Map: R794 Based on: R794AFC

item.title: Field - r794cmni
item.description: SYSTEM COMMON (LPA+CSA) PAGES IN Map: R794 Based on: R794CMNI

item.title: Field - r794cmno
item.description: SYSTEM COMMON (CSA) PAGES OUT Map: R794 Based on: R794CMNO

item.title: Field - r794cri
item.description: Current System UIC (MCTCurSystemUIC) Map: R794 Based on: R794CRI

item.title: Field - r794csai
item.description: SYSTEM CSA PAGES OUT Map: R794 Based on: R794CSAI

item.title: Field - r794erte
item.description: NO. Map: R794 Based on: R794ERTE Description PAGES TO EXT. STOR.

item.title: Field - r794hsp
item.description: Number of hiperspace pages (IN + OUT) Map: R794 Based on: R794HSP

item.title: Field - r794lpai
item.description: SYSTEM LPA PAGES IN Map: R794 Based on: R794LPAI

item.title: Field - r794lpia
item.description: Number of blocks paged in from AUX (private) Map: R794 Based on: R794LPIA

item.title: Field - r794mage
item.description: Migration age Map: R794 Based on: R794MAGE

item.title: Field - r794ppia
item.description: Number of blocked pages paged in from AUX (private) Map: R794 Based on: R794PPIA

item.title: Field - r794prvi
item.description: NUMBER OF PRIVATE PAGES (VIO+NON-VIO) SWAPPED IN Map: R794 Based on: R794PRVI

item.title: Field - r794prvo
item.description: NUMBER OF PRIVATE PAGES (VIO+NON-VIO) SWAPPED OUT Map: R794 Based on: R794PRVO

item.title: Field - r794pspi
item.description: NUMBER OF PAGES SWAPPED IN Map: R794 Based on: R794PSPI

item.title: Field - r794pspo
item.description: NUMBER OF PAGES SWAPPED OUT Map: R794 Based on: R794PSPO

item.title: Field - r794swpo
item.description: NUMBER OF SWAP-OUT Map: R794 Based on: R794SWPO

item.title: Field - r794twss
item.description: TARGET WORKING SETSIZE FOR THE COMMON AREA Map: R794 Based on: R794TWSS

item.title: Field - r794vio
item.description: NUMBER OF VIO PAGES (IN+OUT) Map: R794 Based on: R794VIO

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL

item.title: Field - r79goal
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Data gatherer call TOD Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD

item.title: Field - r79inv
item.description: inval. Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time in 0HHMMSSF format Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79par 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering r79sg 1 Report sorted by SG r79rsm 2 Invalid RSM data obtained r79goal 3 System is in GOAL mode r79trxi 4 Invalid transaction data r79srmc 5 SRM mode changed r79inv 6 inval. r79maxd 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79maxd
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT

item.title: Field - r79par
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID

item.title: Field - r79rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES

item.title: Field - r79sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79srmc
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT

item.title: Field - r79trxi
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S4 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S4 Based on: SMF79TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S4 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM
